name: Rotate-IT
description:
************* Warning ******************
- Did not have time to mix the sound FX and audio so turn your audio down :D
******************************************

Sorry there is no web build, its there but i was getting last minute exceptions so had to remove it.

Theme:

- Didn't really have time to participate properly but still wanted to upload a quick little concept. I went with an obvious? Theme interpretation to make use of what little time I had :)

Controls: 

- Rotate left and right : ’A’, ‘D’ , or left joystick 
- select buttons : mouse, space, or ‘a’ on xbox controller (equivalent action on others)
